item.title: Miners in mascotry mischief
item.author: Fahmida Mannan,
item.description: City and Guilds College Union (CGCU) suffered a spanner in the works after a night out at the Archangel club, in which a covert operation was planned to then whisk the beloved mascot, “Spanner”, into a high-security compound. However, their plans were foiled by a student of the Royal â€¦
